/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and life. The street is lined with lush greenery, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding a serene backdrop to the busy street scene. In the distance, majestic mountains rise, their peaks obscured by the clouds, adding a touch of nature's grandeur to the urban setting. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and grass standing out against the blue of the sky and the varied hues of the buildings.
